import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Carousel,WingBlank, NavBar,Drawer, List,D} from 'antd-mobile'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import './goods.css' import http from '../../utils/http' class Goods extends Component { state={ datalbt:[ 'https://static.21cake.com/upload/images/4e1999f88dd39ad8f98c102e19003eb6.jpg', 'https://static.21cake.com/upload/images/282518e0dd85761d7d0e3cf9ff0d7f09.jpg', 'https://static.21cake.com/upload/images/55c58303cb9a37c4005460d7640a6f20.jpg', 'https://static.21cake.com/upload/images/3b6218417b8c6ebb29d61e381afb3f89.jpg' ], open: false,//抽屉 } //打开商品选择框 openchange=(...args)=>{ let goodsdrawer=document.getElementsByClassName("goods-drawer")[0] console.log(goodsdrawer); if(!this.state.open){ goodsdrawer.style="display:block" }else{ goodsdrawer.style="display:none" } this.setState({open:!this.state.open}) } async componentDidMount(){ //识别是那个商品，然后请求数据 let gid= this.props.location.pathname.split(`${this.props.match.path}/`)[1]; // console.log(gid); const {data}=await http.get('/good/getgood/'+gid); this.setState({ datamsg:[...data] }) } render() { const sidebar=({
